description:
'''Altamiro Carrilho''' (born '''Altamiro Aquino Carrilho'''; December 21, 1924 â€“ August 15, 2012) was a Brazilian [[musician]] and [[composer]]. He is widely regarded as a master [[Western concert flute|flutist]] and a major representative of the [[choro]] genre.

Carrilho died of [[lung cancer]] on August 15, 2012, in [[Rio de Janeiro]].
